entry.title: LUNA SARAH K-STYLE MINI JUTE BAG
entry.summary:
Vendor: FT-Retail
Type: BAG
Price: 195.00

K-Style Mini Jute Bag in beige by LUNA SARAH. This jute handbag features two rolled-up carry handles at the top. Detachable shoulder strap. The fittings are silver.

Material: Recycled rough jute, pink scarf.

Color: Natural beige with black striped print.

Dimensions: Approx. Width: 25cm; Height: 20cm, Depth: 9cm.

Handle drop: 7.0 cm.

Interior: Cotton lining, one zipped pocket, and one side pocket, strap included.

Handmade in Morocco.
